posts.post_content:
One day only

Unsold cards from my prior two listings.  They are in two threads on the second page now if you want to see scans.

Knight Portrait PSA 4 - $49
Devlin Portrait BVG 3 - $34
Hallman Portrait BVG 3 - $33
Bescher Portrait SGC 20 - $24

Krause Pitching SGC 45 - $40
Burch Batting SGC 30 - $30

All six for $200 shipped.

If anyone wants them all for $200 before midnight, they will get all six.  First to bite at this pick six by PM, email or post on this thread wins.

If no one takes all six, offers to buy individual cards for the Doorbuster prices will be filled as received in the order received.

All prices are offered for today only and bids must be placed by midnight on the Net54 clock.  All payments forms are accepted, but the buyer pays the fees for regular PP (about 3%).  All prices include shipping.
 
I will not be updating this thread during the day today, but all winners will be notified no later than tomorrow morning, Sober Saturday.
If you are waiting for CYBER Monday, forget it.:D
